p: Fresh Nigeria ginger ( Zingiber officinale Roscoe) and turmeric ( Curcuma longa Linn) rhizomes were purchased from the local market of Ado-Ekiti, Nigeria. The rhizomes were identified and a voucher specimen was deposited with the Herbarium at the Department of Plant science laboratory, Faculty of science, Ekiti State University, Ado-Ekiti, Nigeria.
